I love this! I’m 5’3” and I got the petite size S. It’s thick, comfortable and the length is perfect. I’m so glad it has pockets. I don’t like wearing tight pants, I think it’s kind of inappropriate, I prefer modest loose pants. I will definitely order more in different colors.

I decided to buy these because they were available in petite. I have really enjoyed wearing them. They fit great and are really comfortable. The length is perfect for me, and I wear them all of the time. They can be dressed up or dressed down. For reference, I’m 5’3, 130 lbs and I decided to get a small because I did not want the waist part being too tight on my stomach area.

I purchased the L petite. Now I see why people pay over $30 for these pants (when they should be about $10 cheaper). It’s the fit. They look exceptionally good on and are particularly slimming. It’s the perfect wide leg. The waist is somewhat fitted, so if you’re unsure about sizing, definitely go up. I’ve already ordered my 2nd pair!
My favorite yoga pants! I like how they fit around the waist but are loose-fitting around the legs. I'm comfortable wearing these shopping and can even golf in them.

Nice fabric and seasonal color. The did not fit me well. But they have good reviews by others.
These are perfect! Love these! I’m tall & bought a very similar pair from Amazon that were much too short.

Like the high waist. Very comfortable pants. I wear them casual days. Not the fabric I would likely choose for dressing up. Could wear as workout but wide leg not as good as joggers for most machine exercises. Heavier Weight & fabric good quality. Not see through. Price point good.

They feel like my leggings but have a classy look! Match with a cute button up and you have yourself a work outfit. Throw on a tank top or baggy sweater and you have a chill day at home look. The taupe is classic, I'm grabbing more colors. I wear a medium in leggings so I bought a plain MEDIUM and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'5, 140lbs.
Nice for lounge pants, but these are really wide in the tops of my legs, not fitted like yoga pants. Opting for a smaller size as the fabric is great with nice pockets
These are so soft and comfortable. Highly recommend

I'm 5' 110ish lbs. I love these pants!! They're so cute and comfy, and I can get away with wearing them to work. With a thick, quality sweater, they look nice enough to pass for work pants. I loved then so much, I bought two, so I could get through the work week.

I love these pants so much, I literally have 6 pairs. I'm 5 feet tall, size 12/14 and the petite large is perfect on me (although I would probably get away with a medium as well). They're super comfortable and versatile - I wear them at home, for going to the gym, to yoga, just out and about running errands, etc. Normally I wouldn't wear loungewear outside my home or the gym but these look so polished, they're good for wearing out normally as well. They're perfect for travel too - again, I'm not one to wear lounge clothes on flights because I think it's in poor taste to wear like sweatpants at the airport, but these look so elevated, they could just be trousers. And again, super comfy!! Honestly I have to stop myself from buying more cause I have enough lol.
I got the small and 29 inseam and it is big definately for a taller person. I am 117 pounds. 4’11
Good quality but seemed a size too small

These wide leg pants fit perfectly to size. I got a medium and I’m a size 10. They have a wide leg without looking big and baggy and are super soft and not see through.  I needed a wider leg,  comfortable pants after having a knee replacement, and these are great. I got them in two colors!

I love these pants. I am short 5'2 and weigh about 135 pounds. I ordered the small, petite. I am going to order a couple more pairs. I prefer the darker colors. I ordered Navy Blue and they are the perfect length for a petite person. Love how they go over the tummy and they are very stylish.

Being 5ft, I always have trouble finding pants that don't drag on the ground. I was very close to giving up on my mission to find pants for my job, so I ordered a petite small in hopes this pair would work for me. These do not touch the ground AT ALL, they are right above the floor and sit at a perfect length. They are super flattering and soft with no weird bunches or lines in the hips and crotch, unlike a lot of athletic wide-leg pants. The quality, fit, and material are worth the price!!

Love the fabric and material hand of the pants ordered. They lay nice and smooth.  I plan to use them for travel.  They look dressier than yoga pants. I’m 5’3, 140 lbs and ordered medium. They fit perfect.

评论概述: The pants are exactly as advertised
评论详情: Love the pants!!! I’ve lost a significant amount of weight and my legs have extra skin but the pants make my legs look flawless. The little stretch makes them comfortable to wear around the house or out.

评论概述: Overall love but seams are falling apart
评论详情: I love these pants! The fit, the thickness everything is great. I've worn these pants about 4 times and I've noticed the seams threads are coming undone.

评论概述: Not for girls with hips and thighs
评论详情: I have short legs and normally wear a short length. The length was perfect but the small was too tight in the hip and thigh which caused the material to pull in that area. The medium was too big in the waist. The were very comfortable, thicker than I expected. Too thick, I think, for the warmer temperatures in the south where I live. I wanted to live them but had to return both sizes.

I am 5’2, 133lbs Bought a small and medium petite because I wasn’t sure about size. I kept the small. The pants are cute And initially thought the leg was too wide. After trying on pants, width and length perfect . The material Is thin so there is not much too hold in Belly bulges but design helps hide it a bit. If they had More tummy Control would have given it 5 stars. I did not find that they ran large as in other reviews.

It is so hard to find wide leg yoga pants that fit me length wise as a petite girl. I weigh 163 and I am 5'2".  I ordered a large and I love everything about these pants!  These pants come in PETITE.AWESOME! They are so flattering, and I love the pockets and the soft feel of the fabric.  I just placed an order for 3 more pairs. I highly recommend these!

The fit and length are perfect.  Well made and look nice enough to go out in. They will make a good travel pant.  My only comment - the static. It went away after I wore them for a while.  I live in Denver where because it is so dry, static happens.  Static Gard helps.
to wear pants were very comfortable gray fit

评论概述: Fabric a little bit too thin.

I wear a size 10 and bought the L.  They fit well.  I am 5'7" and they are long.  The top of the waist comes up quite high -- but they do fit and are QUITE comfortable.  I love the pocket and know I will wear these alot.
Nice enough to wear to work, comfortable enough for yoga.

These are thin (not Lulu lemon thin) breathable yoga pants that are fitted through the upper thigh then flair out nicely. I ordered small petite, I am 5.4 130lbs with an inseam 29/30. These fit great and are Incredibly flattering.
The pants themselves are cute but I don’t think they are for petites. I am 5’0 and mine were like 6 inches too long. I returned.

I love these pants. I can wear them for just about any event. Perfect fit. I originally bought medium and loved the pants, but decided to get a small for my 3rd pair and live the fit even more. I’m 5’3” with an athletic build and the Petite Small fit perfectly! It’s not often I find pants at the perfect length.
Hard to believe the price given fabric and fit. Purchased in black and dark navy. Wear them on repeat with everything from sweatshirts & sneakers to cute tops & boots. Versatile bargain!

these are very comfortable pants that’s all that’s in. Needs to be said the fit is great and you can exercise in them very well. The fabric is soft but there is a hole.in the right pocket. I do not have time to return since I need to accommodate a brace post surgery. Rise is too high for my height (5’1”). I had to fold the waist over. Length can be 1/2” shorter. Quality and cut is fair.

Love these and highly recommend.
These yoga pants are so soft, comfortable & can be dressed up or down. I want them in every color!
The pants are my favorite.  They are so comfortable and I they look professional.  The quality material is perfect strong but not to heavy.

Very comfortable. Will be the pants I wear now.
Love the fit. Wide leg is stylish. Wide waist band doesn’t roll. Pockets are great. Well made - great fabric.
Super comfy, attractive and wrinkle resistant, these are a great value. I have them in 6 colors now!

I hate leggings for myself as I am very much thicck in behind and thigh. Love these! They work great as dress pants. These are a little thicker than most yoga pants so they hold their shape and are super flattering and comfortable. I am 5ft tall, 165 and the XL petite is a perfect fit. Highly recommend!!
I’m short but these aren’t too long. They are really soft, flattering, and overall a keeper.

Very light weight material and soft too. They are a little long. The color is accurate as shown.

Runs very very small. Seams on in seam are double spaced and very rough and irritating.  Very slow delivery. Waste of money.

Literally best pants I have. So comfortable like pajamas but classy enough to wear for business casual. I slept in these because I forgot to take them off. Cooling. Elastic. Good size pockets. Hugs the butt without making the thighs look thick at all. Slims you down. Hides the hips a bit. 10/10. I bought navey blue. Hides the ankles if you forget to shave. If you get a dark color, the wrinkles barely show. I could wear this for the rest of my life ngl. I'm 5'1 and I bought a small. I bought it for myself but makes a great gift. Don't even second guess what you're buying just buy the pants theyr'e amazing.
These are my favorite pants!!!!  Bought them in many colors!

I’m always hesitant buying pants online but these were a win. At 5’2 I ordered the petite and they are the perfect length, loving the high waist and the front pockets make them look a little “formal” than standard yoga pants. Plan to order more in a few more colors .
True to size, great color, silky smooth Definitely buy it in other colors

Love the snug high waist and the really good pockets, but these are not Sweatpants. they are made of the usual yoga type pants fabric.  I was hoping for something warmer.

Bought 4 colors because these pants fit my body so well.  Comes up high and fitted at the waist, fitted at hips, then loosens up to wider  legs. Great for girls with little waists and bigger thighs. Stretchy, but thin and flowy legs. My favorite pants

I am 5'10". Most women's pants aren't long enough for me to not look like a dork. I never wear yoga pants because they hug my upper outer thighs and look dorky as well. These pants are both long enough and loose enough around the outer upper thighs to look flattering. I LOVE THESE PANTS!
